com.ryandw11.structure.io

Class StructureFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
      • com.ryandw11.structure.io.StructureFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StructureFileReader
extends org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
    This handles the Async IO System for saving and loading structures from the logs.

    If you want to find pasted structures you can using the class. Get it from StructureHandler.getSpawnedStructures().

    Note: This feature needs to be enabled by the user in the config.

      • getStructure

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Structure> getStructure(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Get a structure from the storage file.

        This method is async and will complete at a later time.

        The completed future completes exceptionally with StructureNotFoundException if a structure at the specified location cannot be found.

        Usage

        fileReader.getStructure(myLocation)
        .thenAccept(structure -> {
        if(structure != null)
        System.out.println(structure.getName());
        else
        System.out.println("Cannot find a structure at that location!");
        });
        Parameters:
        location - The location to get.
        Returns:
        The completable future that this will return.

      • findNearby

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Pair<Structure,org.bukkit.Location>> findNearby(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Find a structure nearby a location.

        Warning: This operation is expensive on the server. Use lightly.

        The completed future could be null. Null means a structure was not found.

        Parameters:
        location - The location.
        Returns:
        A completable future containing a pair with the structure and location.

      • getStructureLocations

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<org.bukkit.Location>> getStructureLocations(Structure structure)
        Get the locations of a structure.
        Parameters:
        structure - The structure.
        Returns:
        A completable future containing the list of locations.
